instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message:
Hi i have here water damaged 820-2879-b  want power up from charger but powering up from battery. water went on Q7030 and Q7035 so i replace it also i replaced u7000 us well this same time.
R7021 : ok
R7022 : ok
R7010 : ok
R7011 : ok
R5281 : 3.4v
R5280 : 3.4v
U7000 pin 14  CHGR_ACOK :3.26v
L7030 0.43v
any help?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: Voltage on pin 2 from U7000??? if it is ok remove F7040 and check if PPBUSG3H comes high....

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: Sense resistor/traces issue I bet. Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message:
voltage on pin 2 U7000 16.3v ,
resistance U7000 pin 17/18 : 3.3ohm
resistance U7000 pin 27/28 : 35.68ohm
i also removed F7040 and PPBUSG3H is 0.50 v

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
[SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: i know but if i measure resistors they are two 10 ohm

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: if it is not the resistor should be the traces....pin 28-R7021-R7020_R7022-pin 27....

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
[SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: sorry i made mistake with measurements  resistance U7000 pin 27/28 : 35.68  mega ohm

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: If resistors are ok some trace is open, so is up to you.... There is not much more...

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: yes resistor are ok so i dont understand why resistance is so high and not sure how to deal with it, never had that kind of problem yet.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message:
At this point, this is nothing more than connect the dots. You must figure out which line is broken.

Also,

[QUOTE="speedyaction, post: 13417"]
resistance U7000 pin 27/28 : 35.68v [/QUOTE]

Please don't measure resistance in volts, it's hella confusing. :p

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: i was meaning ohm not volts in post above  lol :) i know i done mistake when i read it :)

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2879-b powering up from battery but no power from charger
threads.message: ok fixed. it was broken  track between pin 27 U7000 and  R7020 pin 3. now laptop working and charging battery . thanks :)
